mapper.sql: a.id, a.alarm_record, a.alarm_switch, a.device_addr, a.device_name, a.group_id, a.lat, a.Lng, a.offlineinterval, a.savedatainterval, a.sort, a.use_mark_location, a.max_voice_alarm_times, a.max_sms_alarm_times, a.create_time, a.update_time, a.status, a.device_type, a.block_id, b.name as block_name
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from device a left join info_block b on a.block_id = b.id
order by ${orderByClause}

select
from device a left join info_block b on a.block_id = b.id where a.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into device (alarm_record, alarm_switch, device_addr, device_name, group_id, lat, Lng, offlineinterval, savedatainterval, sort, use_mark_location, max_voice_alarm_times, max_sms_alarm_times, create_time, update_time, status, device_type, block_id ) values (#{alarmRecord,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{alarmSwitch,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deviceAddr,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{lng,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{offlineinterval,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{savedatainterval,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{useMarkLocation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{maxVoiceAlarmTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{maxSmsAlarmTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{blockId,jdbcType=BIGINT} )

update device
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
alarm_record = #{record.alarmRecord,jdbcType=INTEGER},
alarm_switch = #{record.alarmSwitch,jdbcType=INTEGER},
device_addr = #{record.deviceAddr,jdbcType=INTEGER},

Lng = #{record.lng,jdbcType=DOUBLE},

status = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
device_type = #{record.deviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
